name: Trouble with Dribbles: A Sticky Situation
name_original: Trouble with Dribbles: A Sticky Situation
description:
Use A and D to move.

Pick up syrup, avoid Mounties, beat your high score.

You'll get stuck and slow down in your syrup trail so be careful!

Theme: Sticky Justice

Achievement: Tango (magalagums and giantmuskrat)

Jump back to Shenanijam 2018 - https://itch.io/jam/bscotch2018/entries
